## Case Western Reserve University

<img src="project_1_banner.png" style="height: 100%; width: 100%; object-fit: contain" onclick="window.open('https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.07278', 'blank');"/>

Most of my current work is related to butterfly thermal physiology. I try to determine species physiological tolerances and make predictions of species vulnerability to climate change.
